101.comments: Mix of asynchronous and synchronous components: Students can choose to participate synchronous online lectures at the scheduled meeting time or review content asynchronously. Group discussions will be held synchronously but at time arranged by the student groups.

WL1.comments: Note: This is a wailt list for GEOG 316, section 101, Term 1.

description: The role of geophysical events, human ecology, environmental perception, world social and political order in explaining the risk of natural disasters. Assessment of acceptable risk, disaster relief and reconstruction and contrasts between developed and developing nations.
